column2: "Ndom nka nguanhwɛfo a wɔsɛɛ m'edzidzibea do nguan na wɔbɔ hɔn petse no! EWURADZE na ɔse."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: ka dze tsia nguanhwɛfo a wɔnyɛn me man no nye yi: Hom abɔ mo nguankuw apetse
column7: medze hom ndzeyɛɛ no mbusu mebɛba abɛsera hom

column2: "Na emi mara mobɔboa mo nguankuw nkaa no ano mefi asaase nyina a mapam hɔn makɔ hɔ no do
column3: na medze hɔn aba hɔn nguamban mu bio; na wɔawowo na wɔadɔr."

column2: "Na mibesisi hɔn do nguanhwɛfo a wɔbɛnyɛn hɔn; na worunnsuro bio
column3: eso wɔrommbɔ hu
nda reba a
column5: mebɛma Odubaa tsenenee bi do mama David
column6: na obedzi hen dɛ ɔhen a ɔyɛ enyansadze
column7: na ɔayɛ atsɛmbu na pɛrpɛr wɔ asaase no do."

column2: "Ne nda no mu na wɔbɛgye Juda nkwa
column3: na Israel atsena ase dwudwoodwo na iyi nye dzin a wɔdze bɛfrɛ no; EWURADZE hɛn tsenenee."
hwɛ
column7: Dɛ EWURADZE a oyii Israelmba fii Egypt asaase do tse ase yi;"

column3: dɛ
column4: Dɛ EWURADZE a okeyii Israel fi asefo fii kwaamu afamu mbew do bae no tse ase yi; na wɔbɛtsena hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo no ho dze: M'akoma a ɔda mo mu ebubu
column3: me mbiew nyinara him biribiriw; mayɛ dɛ ɔsabofo
column4: na dɛ nyimpa a nsa etum no; wɔ EWURADZE ntsi

column2: "Na awartofo ayɛ asaase no ma; na mpaamba ntsi
column3: asaase no dzi awerɛhow; sar do edzidzibea akyenkyen; na hɔn anamɔnkwan yɛ mbusu

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛnyi na ɔsɔfo nyina ho ekum; nyew
column3: me fie mpo

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn kwan bɛyɛ hɔn dɛ mbea a ɔyɛ tortor wɔ sum mu: wɔbɔtwe hɔn akɔ ma wɔakɔhwehwe ase wɔ mu: na medze mbusu mebɛba hɔn do
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn asotwe afe no

column2: "Na mehu nkwaseasɛm wɔ Samaria nkɔnhyɛfo no mu; wɔdze Baal hyɛɛ nkɔm na wɔmaa me man Israel fomee."

column3: mehu dza ɔyɛ hu mbordo bi; wɔto awar
column6: amma obiara emmfi n'emumuyɛ mu annsan: hɔn nyinara ayɛ me dɛ Sodom
column7: na hɔn mu hɔn a wɔtse hɔ no ayɛ dɛ Gomora."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo no ho nye yi: Medze ɔbɔwen bɛnyɛn hɔn
column3: na mama wɔanom ewudur nsu: na ahokum fi Jerusalɛm nkɔnhyɛfo no nkyɛn akɔ asaase no nyina do."
Mma hom nntsie nkɔnhyɛfo no a wɔhyɛ hom nkɔm no hɔn nsɛm no; wɔkyerɛkyerɛ hom adze huhuw: hɔnankasa hɔn akoma enyido adzehu na wɔka

column2: "Wɔka daa kyerɛ hɔn a wommbu me bi dɛ
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: Hom benya asomdwee; na obiara a ɔnantsew noara n'akoma ne ntsintsiman mu no so wɔse no dɛ

column3: ama oeehu na ɔaatse n'asɛm? Woana na woetsie n'asɛm
EWURADZE n'ehum
column7: ekyinehyia ehum a ɔbɔbɔ ebesi emumuyɛfo etsifi a."

column3: ma ekodu dɛ obowie na ɔayɛ dza ɔahyehyɛ wɔ n'akoma mu nyina: nda a odzi ekyir no mu na hom bɛtse ase kofee."
naaso wotuu mbirika: emi mankasa annkyerɛ hɔn
nkyɛ wɔmaa me man tsiee me nsɛm
column4: na wɔsaan hɔn fii hɔn kwan bɔn na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bɔn no ho."

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: na nnyɛ Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir?"

column2: "Aso obi botum ehuntsa noho wɔ huntsabea bi a emi murunnhu no? EWURADZE na ɔse. Ana mennhyɛ ɔsor na asaase ma? EWURADZE na ɔse."
"Matse dza nkɔnhyɛfo a wɔhyɛ ator nkɔm wɔ me dzin mu aka
column3: dɛ

column2: "Ɔnkyɛr nkodu dabɛn ara na iyi bɔko nkɔnhyɛfo a wɔhyɛ ator nkɔm no akoma mu; nkɔnhyɛfo a wɔhyɛ hɔnankasa hɔn akoma mu ndaadaa nkɔm no a?"
"Wɔdwen dɛ wɔbɛma me man werɛ efir me dzin wɔ hɔn adaaso a hɔn mu nyimpa biara ka kyerɛ ne nyɛnko no ntsi
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom werɛ fiir me dzin wɔ Baal ntsi no."
ma ɔnka n'adaaso; na nyia ɔwɔ m'asɛm
column4: ma ɔnka m'asɛm nokwar mu. Ebɛn na ntsɛw nye ewifua wɔ yɛ? EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Ana m'asɛm nntse dɛ ogya? EWURADZE na ɔse; na dɛ hamɛr a opuepue ɔbotan mu esinesin?"

column3: Ebɛn na EWURADZE dze ebua wo? Asɛm bɛn na EWURADZE aka?"
